ARABIC: وَمَن يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّ أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِى ٱنتِقَامٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and if Allah guides someone, he cannot be misguided. Is Allah not Almighty, Exactor of Revenge?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And none can lead him astray who has been guided by God. Is not God all-mighty, the lord of retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And he whom Allah guides to the Right Way, none can lead him astray. Is not Allah the Most Mighty, the Lord of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Who can mislead one whom God has guided? Is God not Majestic and Revengeful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And no one can mislead whomever Allah guides; is not Allah the Most Honourable, the Avenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And whomsoever Allah guides, for him there will be no misleader. Is not Allah Almighty, Possessor of Retribution
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whom Allah guides, there is none that can lead him astray; is not Allah Mighty, the Lord of retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But whomso God guides, none shall lead him astray; is not God All-mighty, All-vengeful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he whom Allah guideth, for him there can be no misleader. Is not Allah Mighty, Able to Requite (the wrong)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but he whom God guides cannot be led astray by anyone. Is God not mighty and capable of retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whomsoever Allah guideth, for him there shall be no misleader. Is not Allah Mighty, and Lord of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and whomever Allah guides, there is no one who can lead him astray. Is not Allah an all-mighty avenger?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And such as Allah doth guide there can be none to lead astray. Is not Allah Exalted in Power, (Able to enforce His Will), Lord of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And whomsoever Allah guides, for him there will be no misleader. Is not Allah All-Mighty, Possessor of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But he whom Allah guides, none can lead astray. Is not Allah the Almighty, capable of retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And whomever God guides, for him there is no misleader. Is God not Powerful and Vengeful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:37] But whomever God guides, there is no one [able] to lead him astray. Is not God Mighty, One Whose way [always] prevails, a Lord of Retribution?, against His enemies? Indeed, He is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he whom Allah guideth) to His religion, (for him there can be no misleader) from His religion; the reference here is to Abu Bakr and his fellow believers; it is also said that the reference is to the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh). (Is not Allah Mighty) in His sovereignty and dominion, (Able to Requite) Able to take revenge on those who disbelieve in Him?
